description.narrative: The main project goal is to increase agricultural production and improve farmers' income. The principal objective of the project is to restore agricultural production to pre-war level through the rehabilitation of the agricultural sector.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Food Security

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire
